flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: To keep from beingnblown away by thenwind, they gatherfin clusters. Theyndo enjoy gentlenbreezes, though.
Its body is sonlight, it mustngrip the groundffirmly with itsnfeet to keep fromnbeing blown away.
It can be carriednaway on even thengentlest breeze.fIt may even floatnall the way to thennext town.
This POKéMON drifts and floats with thenwind. If it senses the approach ofnstrong winds, HOPPIP links its leavesfwith other HOPPIP to prepare againstnbeing blown away.
This POKéMON drifts and floats with thenwind. If it senses the approach ofnstrong winds, HOPPIP links its leavesfwith other HOPPIP to prepare againstnbeing blown away.
This POKéMON drifts and floats with thenwind. If it senses the approach of strongnwinds, a HOPPIP links leaves with othersnto prepare against being blown away.
Its body is so light, it must grip thenground firmly with its feet to keep fromnbeing blown away.
To keep from being blown away by thenwind, they gather in clusters. They donenjoy gentle breezes, though.
It drifts on winds. It is said thatnwhen HOPPIP gather in fields andnmountains, spring is on the way.

To keep from being blown away bynthe wind, they gather in clusters.nBut they do enjoy gentle breezes.
Its body is so light, it mustngrip the ground firmly with itsnfeet to keep from being blown away.
Il dérive avec le vent. Sa présencenen nombre dans les champs et lesnmontagnes annonce le printemps.
It drifts on winds. It is said thatnwhen Hoppip gather in fields andnmountains, spring is on the way.

とても　かるい　からだ。nふきとばされないよう　しっかりnじめんを　ふみしめている。
매우 가벼운 몸을 가졌다.n바람에 날아가지 않도록 단단히n지면을 밟아 지탱하고 있다.
Son corps est si léger qu’il doit s’agripper au sol pournéviter de s’envoler les jours de brise.
Sein Körper ist so leicht, dass es seine Füße imnBoden verankert, damit es nicht davongeweht wird.
Su cuerpo es tan ligero, que debe agarrarse bien alnsuelo con las patas para no irse con el viento.
Ha un corpo così leggero che deve aggrapparsinsaldamente al suolo per non volare via.
Its body is so light, it must grip the ground firmlynwith its feet to keep from being blown away.
とても　軽い　体。n吹き飛ばされないよう　しっかりn地面を　踏みしめている。
かぜに　ながされて　ただよう。nのやまに　ハネッコが　あつまりだすとnはるが　おとずれると　いわれている。
바람에 날려 떠다닌다.n산과 들에 통통코가 모여들면n봄이 찾아온다고 전해진다.
Il dérive avec le vent. Sa présence en nombre dansnles champs et les montagnes annonce le printemps.
Es reitet auf dem Wind. Man sagt, wenn sichnHoppspross versammeln, kommt der Frühling bald.
Flotan en el aire. Se dice que, cuando los Hoppip senreúnen, es que la primavera está al caer.
Giunge sospinto dai venti. Si dice che quandonHoppip appare su campi e monti, la primavera sianin arrivo.
It drifts on winds. It is said that when Hoppip gathernin fields and mountains, spring is on the way.
風に　流されて　漂う。n野山に　ハネッコが　集まり出すとn春が　訪れると　言われている。
かぜに　のって　ふわふわ　ただよう　ポケモン。nきょうふうの　けはいを　かんじると　なかまどうしnはっぱを　からめ　とばされない　じゅんびをする。
바람을 타고 둥둥 떠다니는 포켓몬이다.n강풍의 기척을 느끼면 동료끼리n잎사귀를 휘감아 날아가지 않도록 준비한다.
Ce Pokémon flotte à la dérive, porté par le vent. S’il sentnqu’un vent très fort approche, Granivol attache ses feuilles auxnautres Granivol pour ne pas être emporté par la bourrasque.
Hoppspross lässt sich vom Wind treiben. Wenn es bemerkt,ndass ein Sturm aufkommt, verbindet es seine Blätter mitnanderen Hoppspross, damit es nicht davongeweht wird.

Este Pokémon flota en el aire y se deja llevar. Cuandonpercibe que el viento va a cambiar a fuerte, Hoppip entrelazansus hojas con otros Hoppip para hacer resistencia y evitarnsalir volando por la fuerza de la corriente.
Hoppip fluttua nell’aria trasportato dal vento. Se percepiscenl’avvicinarsi di una forte corrente, Hoppip unisce le foglie connquelle dei suoi simili per non essere spazzato via.
This Pokémon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses thenapproach of strong winds, Hoppip links its leaves with othernHoppip to prepare against being blown away.
風に　乗って　ふわふわ　漂う　ポケモン。n強風の　気配を　感じると　仲間同士n葉っぱを　絡め　飛ばされない　準備をする。
かぜに　のって　ふわふわ　ただよう　ポケモン。nきょうふうの　けはいを　かんじると　なかまどうしnはっぱを　からめ　とばされない　じゅんびをする。
바람을 타고 둥둥 떠다니는 포켓몬이다.n강풍의 기척을 느끼면 동료끼리n잎사귀를 휘감아 날아가지 않도록 준비한다.

Hoppspross lässt sich vom Wind treiben. Wenn es bemerkt,ndass ein Sturm aufkommt, verbindet es seine Blätter mitnanderen Hoppspross, damit es nicht davongeweht wird.

Este Pokémon flota en el aire y se deja llevar. Cuandonpercibe que el viento va a cambiar a fuerte, Hoppip entrelazansus hojas con otros Hoppip para hacer resistencia y evitarnsalir volando por la fuerza de la corriente.
Hoppip fluttua nell’aria trasportato dal vento. Se percepiscenl’avvicinarsi di una forte corrente, Hoppip unisce le foglie connquelle dei suoi simili per non essere spazzato via.
This Pokémon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses thenapproach of strong winds, Hoppip links its leaves with othernHoppip to prepare against being blown away.
風に　乗って　ふわふわ　漂う　ポケモン。n強風の　気配を　感じると　仲間同士n葉っぱを　絡め　飛ばされない　準備をする。
Seinen leichten Körper weht selbst eine Brisendavon. Es liebt es, sich vom warmennFrühlingswind treiben zu lassen.
Es lässt sich vom Wind treiben. Manchmal verirrtnes sich, wenn es von einem Windstoß davon-ngeweht wird.
